item.title: Basics of Computation
item.description: Storage, Precision, Error, etc To have some understanding of how the numbers are processed in computers, we have to understand how the numbers are stored first. Computers stores everything in binary form 1. Suppose we randomly get some segments in the memory, we have no idea what that stands for since we do not know the type of data it represents. Some of the most used data types in data science are integer, float, string, time.
